## BasicRandom.mixin() method

extends class's prototype

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static mixin(options: MixinOptions): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | [MixinOptions](./dw-random.mixinoptions.md) | methods |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Example


```javascript
BasiceRandom.mixin({
 percent() {
   return `${this.float({ min: 0, max: 100, fixed: 2 })}%`;
 },
});

const R = new Random();
R.percent(); // '10.12%'
R.n(R.percent, 2) // ['12.10%', '25.22%']

```
